meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rough or harsh in sound.
meanings.sent1: The raspiness of the old record player made the music sound scratchy.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the raspiness of the gravel under my feet as I walked along the path.
meanings.sent3: The raspiness of the cat's meow made it sound like a tiny lion.
meanings.sent4: The raspiness of the wind against the window was like a whispering ghost.
meanings.sent5: The raspiness of the chainsaw echoed through the forest, signaling the start of work.
